name: Grisaia: Phantom Trigger 06
overview: The missing link in the previous series is revealed. Here comes the sixth installment in the GRISAIA PHANTOM TRIGGER series. Several years after Yuuji Kazami and his friends fought for their lives in a fierce battle, a new generation of heroines gather at Mihama Academy, which has been reinstated as a 'specialist training school'. Taking place in the same world as The Fruit of Grisaia, new characters bring an exciting fresh take in Volume 6 of this brand new series! This thrilling story, which unfolds at the reborn Mihama Academy, will undoubtedly excite not only those who have played previous releases, but those who are new to the series as well!
